title: 8268120: Allow hardware cursor to be used on Monocle-EGL platforms
body:
Add EGL cursor implementation (Java + native) and the link to low-level drivers. Fix for JDK-8268120 --------- ### Progress - [x] Change must not contain extraneous whitespace - [x] Commit message must refer to an issue - [ ] Change must be properly reviewed ### Issue * [JDK-8268120](https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8268120): Allow hardware cursor to be used on Monocle-EGL platforms ### Reviewing
Using git Checkout this PR locally: \ `$ git fetch https://git.openjdk.java.net/jfx pull/527/head:pull/527` \ `$ git checkout pull/527` Update a local copy of the PR: \ `$ git checkout pull/527` \ `$ git pull https://git.openjdk.java.net/jfx pull/527/head`
Using Skara CLI tools Checkout this PR locally: \ `$ git pr checkout 527` View PR using the GUI difftool: \ `$ git pr show -t 527`
Using diff file Download this PR as a diff file: \ https://git.openjdk.java.net/jfx/pull/527.diff
